channel.title: SeedProt - Beta 1.1_02 Server hMod Plugin - BugFix
channel.description:
Basically there is a bug in the old Beta that allows users to destroy any block (even bedrock if done correctly) extremely easily. This includes protected chests as well.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kRPYjj9nvag - Thanks to whattehp406 for finding this video
I wrote a plugin for the official server to fix it, and now I will give it to you as well.
Plugin attached.
(Note that it was fixed in Beta 2, so this only applies to servers running the older version)

item.title: SeedProt - Beta 1.1_02 Server hMod Plugin - BugFix
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:3, topic:379774”]How do people find this out? Just messing around? If it was intended then that’s really smart…[/quote]Probably just messing around

[quote=“I Vain I”]It’s a plugin-patch that fixes the bug in lightweight chest. So it’s for servers.[/quote]It’s actual to patch a bug in the server itself, not from LWC.

Read full topic
item.source: SeedProt - Beta 1.1_02 Server hMod Plugin - BugFix
